verbose_text: A specific role of ORF45 in KSHV virion assembly was revealed by the finding that ORF45 interacts with the microtubule (MT) associated kinesin-2 motor protein, KIF3A, and mediates the docking of entire viral capsid - tegument complex on to the cargo binding domain of KIF3A.
evidence: ORF45 interacts with the microtubule (MT) associated kinesin-2 motor protein, KIF3A, and mediates the docking
